Detailed Description

Objects of this class extracts an route-map and sends it via socket to the route-module.

After the map is send (or the time out time is reached) the process (thread) ends and the object is deleted by the runtime JTC system.

Creates one RouteMapGenerator.

Parameters:
mh The MapHandler to use to retreiving the Map:s
mapID Pointer to the mapID that the searchmap should be generated for.
port The port to listen to connection on.
overview The ID:s of the overview maps. (Should be in the maps in the future).

Creates connections and costs from the nodes in the nodeVector.

Parameters:

conns Forward connections.
backConns Backward connections.
connDatas Connection datas. The indeces will be updated.
send_forward If true, the forward connections will be send and the indeces of the connectiondatas will reflect the forward connections.

Returns:

bool RouteMapGenerator::sendMapHierarchy (  const GenericMap *  theMap,
Writeable *  socket
)  [private]
 

Sends information about the map hierarchy to the RouteModule.

PosSizeComment
0 4 bytes The number of levels from this level and up = n .
8*[0..n[ + 4 4 bytes level number
8*[0..n[ + 8 4 bytes Map id for level

Parameters:
theMap The current map.
socket The socket to send the data on.
Returns:
True if the data could be sent.

bool RouteMapGenerator::sendNodeExpansionTable (  const GenericMap *  theMap,
Writeable *  socket
)  [private]
 

Sends information about the map hierarchy to the RouteModule.

PosSizeComment
0 4 bytes The number of expanded nodes = n .
8*[0..n[ + 4 4 bytes Expanded node id
8*[0..n[ + 8 4 bytes Multi conn index
8*n + 4 4 bytes The number of multi connections = m .
8*[n + 1] + 8*[0..m[ 4 bytes From node id
8*[n + 1] + 8*[0..m[ + 4 4 bytes To node id

Parameters:
theMap The current map.
socket The socket to send the data on.
Returns:
True if the data could be sent.

void RouteMapGenerator::writeConnectionData (  DataBuffer *  conBuffer,
Connection *  conn,
const Node *  toNode,
const GenericMap *  theMap,
bool  externalConnection = false
)  [inline, static, private]
 

Writes the data needed for the routing to a databuffer.

Parameters:
conBuffer Pointer to the Databuffer where to store the data.
con The connection to save into conBuffer.
toNode The node which the connection is leading to.
theMap The map where con is located.
externalConnection If true that means that the specified connection is an external connection, otherwise it is assumed to be an ordinary connection. Defaults to false.

void RouteMapGenerator::writeConnectionData (  DataBuffer *  conBuffer,
uint32  costA,
uint32  costB,
uint32  costC,
uint32  costD,
uint32  vehicleRest
)  [inline, static, private]
 

Writes the connection data to the databuffer.

Parameters:
conBuffer Buffer to write the data to.
costA Distance cost.
costB Time cost.
costC Time cost with disturbances.
costD Unused.
vehicleRest Vehicle restrictions.
